modName: Blood and Dark - HD Hide armor Retexture
summary: Makes the Hide Armor more Dark, and more Bloody... (Do not include shield&Helmet)
descriptionHtml:
(Sorry for my english, i\'m french. :x)

Hey !
This mod is retexture (only, if you want me to make a mod which ADDS that armor, tell me in comment, or PM me) of the Hide armor, to make it more Bloody and more Dark.

Male&Female versions, and doesn\'t include the shield or the helmet.
Look at the screens to make an idea. 




SEE ALSO MY OTHER MODS :

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5076] Menu music - Dovahkiin - Metal remix [/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6292] LevelUp sound replacement - Morrowind\'s Levelup [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8467] Better and Younger Lydia [/url]


Mods used on the screens :
- This one
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666] CBBE Body&Face [/url] by Caliente
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/60] Enhanced Blood Textures [/url] by dDefinder1
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15425] Stakado Cinemascope ENB [/url] (w/ options)  by stakado
And The Dance of Death helped me for killmoves.
author: Hyrul
